an3.131:4.1: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, paṭicchannāni āvahanti, no vivaṭāni.
an3.131:4.3: Mātugāmo, bhikkhave, paṭicchanno āvahati, no vivaṭo;
an3.131:4.4: brāhmaṇānaṃ, bhikkhave, mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti, no vivaṭā;
an3.131:4.5: micchādiṭṭhi, bhikkhave, paṭicchannā āvahati, no vivaṭā.
an3.131:4.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti, no vivaṭāni.
an3.131:5.1: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannāni.
an3.131:5.3: Candamaṇḍalaṃ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṃ virocati, no paṭicchannaṃ;
an3.131:5.4: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṃ virocati, no paṭicchannaṃ;*
an3.131:5.5: tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, vivaṭo virocati, no paṭicchanno.
an3.131:5.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannānī”ti.
